item.title: Tuning your ISE
item.description: After being silent for a while it’s time to explode with some really great stuff! Let’s start with the environment you develop the scripts in. There are several options out of there: free PowerGUI – very popular IDE but doesn’t look nice for me, Sapiens PowerShell Studio – seems to be a powerful tool but costs 389$ at the moment. So I look back to the ISE that is bundled with WMF 4.
